sect2.title: Introduction to pilot-link
sect2.para: The pilot-link package provides a suite of tools containing a series of conduits, libraries, and language bindings for moving information to and from your Palm device and your desktop or server/workstation system, as well as across a network.

sect2.title: Installation of pilot-link
sect2.para: Install pilot-link by running the following commands:

sect2.title: Command explanations
sect2.para: --with-perl --with-java --with-tcl=/usr/lib --with-python: Use any or all of these options to enable the respective language bindings desired.

sect3.title: Configuration Information
sect3.para: You may need to configure the USB_SERIAL_VISOR device into the kernel before your system can communicate with your Palm device.
